success.thankYou: Thank you for booking at Westay, your booking information will be sent to the E-Mail address you provided!
success.backHome: Click here to return to the home page
success.contact: Please contact us at Hotline: 0916.374.057 for assistance.

invoice.pleasePayment: Please select a form of payment
invoice.selectPayment: Please select one of the payment methods below to make a payment. If you pay via domestic ATM card, please select the appropriate bank. Payment will be made via electronic payment gateway
invoice.desVia1: It is a safe and secure form of online payment via domestic cards issued by banks (Bao Kim payment gateway). The service is automatically activated immediately after payment, simpler and more convenient for customers.
invoice.desVia2: - To pay by ATM card, your card must be registered and activated online payment function with the bank (internet banking) before using.
invoice.desVia3: - Your credit card information will be kept confidential and confirmed with the card issuing bank.
invoice.redirect: You are being transferred to Bao Kim to continue payment
invoice.paymentDirect: You will transfer directly to Westay without going through an intermediary payment gateway

directPayment.desfooter: Any questions please contact the phone number: 0916 374 057 or 0917 041 849
